narrative.title: Pavia Division - 1940Q3
narrative.situation: Italian Divisione Autotrasportabile AS (Auto-transportable Infantry Division) deployed in North Africa during 1940Q3.
narrative.objectives: Coastal defense Sabratha-Surman sector, positioned for Italian invasion of Egypt (September 13, 1940, Operation E). Advanced to Sidi Barrani.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.
